fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to parse the PubMed documents of search results (for more details see (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/entrez/query/DTD/pubmed_060101.dtd). The specified directory will be searched for xml, gz or zip files, if recursive search is activated the subdirectories are going to be search too. All the contained xml, gz or zip files are parsed. The document data is stored in the outgoing data table.
fullDescription.option: Set the directory containing the files to parse.
If checked, the specified directory is searched for files recursively.
Specifies the category of the documents to set.
Specifies the source of the documents to set. If no source is specified the PubMed default source "PubMed" is used by default.

ports.dataOut: An output table containing the parsed document data.
